DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess feasibility perform repetitive coronary angiogram via radial approach
DOC.detailed_description: Assessing succes radial access patient prior TRA procedure
DOC.criteria: Patients previous successful radial artery approach schedule elective transradial coronary angiography Lack indication perform radial approach Abnormal Barbeau test result ( type C D ) Presence radial artery occlusion Previous important trauma upper limb Presence fistula renal dialysis Lymphoedema Acute myocardial infarction Refusal sign inform consent form
